description: [Star Blizzard](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1033) has registered domains using randomized words and with names resembling legitimate organizations.(Citation: CISA Star Blizzard Advisory December 2023)(Citation: StarBlizzard)

external_references.description: CISA, et al. (2023, December 7). Russian FSB Cyber Actor Star Blizzard Continues Worldwide Spear-phishing Campaigns. Retrieved June 13, 2024.
Microsoft Threat Intelligence. (2023, December 7). Star Blizzard increases sophistication and evasion in ongoing attacks. Retrieved February 13, 2024.
